com.github.errantlinguist.latticevisualiser
Class LatticeVisualiser

java.lang.Object
  com.github.errantlinguist.latticevisualiser.LatticeVisualiser
All Implemented Interfaces:
Settings, edu.berkeley.cs.SysExits
public class LatticeVisualiser
extends Object
implements Settings, edu.berkeley.cs.SysExits

A simple tool for visualising ASR word/phone lattices from the Millennium ASR system using the JUNG Framework.

Since:
2011-11-12
Version:
2011-11-12

Constructor Detail

LatticeVisualiser

public LatticeVisualiser(Graph<Integer,Edge> graph,
                         ImmutableSet<String> nonwords,
                         Dimension windowDimension,
                         double stateSizeMultiplier,
                         int minStateSize)
Parameters:
graph - The Graph to be visualised.
nonwords - An ImmutableSet of symbols which represent non-word labels.
windowDimension - The Dimension to be used for creating the main window.
stateSizeMultiplier - The state/vertex size multiplier to use to scale their size based on the number of incoming/outgoing edges they have.
minStateSize - The minimum size of a state/vertex, to avoid them being too small to see on-screen.
Method Detail

createFileReader

private static FileLineReader<Edge,DirectedSparseGraph<Integer,Edge>> createFileReader()
Returns:
A new FileLineReader for reading lattice files.

getMaxOutEdges

private static <V,E> int getMaxOutEdges(Graph<V,E> graph)
Returns the maximum count of outgoing edges for a single vertex.

Type Parameters:
V - The Graph vertex type.
E - The Graph edge type.
Parameters:
graph - The Graph to get the maximum outgoing edge count for.
Returns:
The maximum count of outgoing edges for a single vertex.

main

public static void main(String[] args)
Parses command-line arguments for input file, window width and height, minimum state (i.e. vertex) size and the state/vertex size multiplier. The input file is then read and visualised.

Parameters:
args - The command-line arguments.

printInfo

private static <V,E> void printInfo(Graph<V,E> graph)
Prints information about a given Graph to the standard output.

Type Parameters:
V - The Graph vertex type.
E - The Graph edge type.
Parameters:
graph - The Graph to print information about.

readLattice

private static DirectedSparseGraph<Integer,Edge> readLattice(File infile)
                                                      throws IOException,
                                                             ParseException
Parameters:
infile - The input File to read which represents the word/phone lattice to visualise.
Returns:
A DirectedSparseGraph representing the word/phone lattice in the given file.
Throws:
IOException - If the given input path for a non-word label file does not refer to a valid file or another I/O error occurs.
ParseException - If there is an error parsing the contents of a given input non-word label file path.

readNonwordLabelSet

private static ImmutableSet<String> readNonwordLabelSet(File infile)
                                                 throws IOException,
                                                        ParseException
Creates an ImmutableSet of non-word labels from a given infile.

Parameters:
infile - The File to read.
Returns:
An ImmutableSet of symbols representing non-word labels.
Throws:
IOException - If the input File object does not refer to a valid file or another I/O error occurs.
ParseException - If there is an error parsing the contents of the file.

createVisualizationServer

private VisualizationImageServer<Integer,Edge> createVisualizationServer(Layout<Integer,Edge> layout)
Creates a new VisualizationImageServer using a given Layout and the LatticeVisualiser settings.

Parameters:
layout - The Layout to use.
Returns:
A new VisualizationImageServer.
